headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  OLINGER, MERVIN G.

snippet: OLINGER--Mervin G.,MD, 98, formerly of Verona, NJ, died on June 17, 2016, in Fairfield, NJ. Born in Bloomfield, NJ, he graduated from Cornell University Medical School. He is survived by his wife of 73 years, Renee Olinger (nee Egelka), three children, Ken, Susan, and Lois, six grandchildren and one great-grandchild. 1/3
lead_paragraph: OLINGER--Mervin G.,MD, 98, formerly of Verona, NJ, died on June 17, 2016, in Fairfield, NJ. Born in Bloomfield, NJ, he graduated from Cornell University Medical School. He is survived by his wife of 73 years, Renee Olinger (nee Egelka), three children, Ken, Susan, and Lois, six grandchildren and one great-grandchild. 1/3
